message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you less than 50%, but it's a good starting point. Your turn to negotiate!
You gave me less than 50%, I'll give you a bit more. Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting closer to the 50/50, but I'm still not there. Give me a bit more and we can finish this!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but not too much
I'm not budging, I want a bigger share. You're running out of time!
I'm not giving up! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
